ygData.subject: Apologies, Explinations, and Statement
ygData.msgSnippet: First let me apologize for spaming the list the last few times. Second let me explain as the Wanderer already did for me, that infact I am not spaming the list
ygData.messageBody:
First let me apologize for spaming the list the last few times.

Second let me explain as the Wanderer already did for me, that infact I am
not spaming the list the web mail client I occasionally use when not at home
is spaming it. I do try not to post often because of this. But sometimes I
want to say and be a part and I hope that it'll behave that time.

Third it's some times more polite to note that if there are mulitple copies
of the message that more then likely if it is an on topic mail that contains
the same message and no binary that it's probably a server problem outside
of the users control. However I did have and will continue to deal with my
ISP about the issue.

Fourth I'm really glad to hear and see so many other stories of bards
misunderstood :) Thought it was only me for a bit

Adon Draigcanwyr
